A lash for the parable-makers under the allegory of apes and monkeys.
4 p.
Printed for C.B. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ..., London : 1691.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. A satire on coffee-house society. Imperfect: pages faded and torn. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
